headline: AMAT to Post Q4 Earnings: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: Applied Materials' innovation in advanced chip tech and solid service growth offset near-term China and macro headwinds ahead of Q4 results.

headline: KLA Corporation (KLAC)’s Shares Upgraded By Barclays
summary: We recently published 13 Best Semiconductor Equipment Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is one of the largest semiconductor equipment companies in the sector. Its products cover several areas of chip production, such as deposition, etching, inspection, and design […]
